Index.title: Hi, I'm
Index.name: Vitor Henrique
Index.content: I'm a full-stack developer with over 8 years of experience with a wide range of business cases. In this over 8 years I had the oportunity to work with several tecnologies, among them we might find: Typescript Javascript, VueJS, React, Sass, Stylus, e o bom e velho Jquery.

Blog.title: Blog
Blog.disclaimer: I promise you that in the future we will have some cool stuff here.

About.title: Hello, I'm
About.name: Vitor Henrique
About.picture-alt: A picture of Vitor using a white T-shirt and a white cap while jogging
About.me-now: I am currently working as a technology specialist at Grupo Boticario. But I started as a web developer on a startup in Pelotas called Melhor Envio.
About.me-thrive: Since that time I have always focused on improving my knowledge. I studied SOLID, Clean Code and Automated Tests. I even studied enough to have a very superficial base of UX and UI
About.me-interests: Among my personal interests are Zelda, Mario and different musical styles. As of my future? I'd like to quote Hamilton: "There's a million things I haven't done. But just you wait"

Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.subtitle: The projects shown here are projects that I had huge participaiton in it's development and publishing as also maintenance and bug correction.

Error.title: Oops!!
Error.message: Sorry, That's on us. Do you mind trying again?
